moves.1. d4: Interesting game against my online buddy, Tiddles. White loses this game in an orgy of sacrifices, when steady play was needed.
moves.14. h5 Rfb8 15. e5: This move,15  e5!, ensures White's attack arrives first.
moves.17. Bd3 Nxg4: Black wants to do something to break up the attack
moves.18. Bxg7: BxB?! is an attempt to complicate the attack when none is needed. Simply PxN, BxP is fine for White.
moves.22... Qxg2 23. Qxg2+ Kh8 24. Qd2 c5: Now if the N is taken the bishop is pinned. White resigns
